title: "Matchmaking" ahahahahahahaha
body:
Dw guys, our MMR must be the same!


ahahahahahhahaha

replies.body: You do realize your teams mmr is slight higher then theirs. Gold team might just been at a losing streak to get matched up with silvers. Or the silver is on a winning streak. Its completely fair system.

wow, they got a gold 3 player, so amazing, matchmaking sure is shit.

**f**uck off dumbas**s**
You're acting like theirs a difference between Silver 2 and Gold 3, fun fact its not its equally trash, those Golds would've had low MMR.
Yep, totally. You're completely right. Those teams were perfectly equal!
